overview: A man who sells sounds finds himself in a situation that he must experience water, soil, wind, and fire to kiss a girl. He must hear all women he meets on his path – who are in fact one woman – and also the men who are all one man except he himself. he must reach a point that at the end of the journey, he erases all the sounds he has recorded to sell, leaves all he has, and be the messenger of the man he himself has turned into.
title: Hoopoe
